name: Secret Platformer [abandoned]
description:
Controls:

  • Arrow keys (↑↓←→) to move
  • Z to jump
  • R to restart

abandoned project, worked on-and-off on this from around 2019-12 to 2020-10, stopped working on it, life happens
name started as placeholder, been so long might leave it or mutate it so it sounds better

features parallax, music loop (me), collision, pixel art, made in gamemaker studio 2

revisit if at all may take longer, have to learn godot (you can use it offline and is free, not subscription)

inspired by cave story
